on alfred_script(q)
tell application "System Events" set frontmostProcess to name of first item of (processes whose frontmost is true) tell process frontmostProcess tell window 1 set oldSize to get size set size to {q, item 2 of oldSize} end tell end tell end tell
end alfred_script
Define width in pixels as argument

Workflow to set the width of the window with the current focus.
Use `ww {$width}` to set the window to a custom width. Like `ww 1600`.
The original AppleScript is from Brian Boyer: https://gist.github.com/brianboyer/2648545
